description: Bright clean studio apartment in the heart of Chelsea.   Full kitchen, beautiful stand up shower, washer/dryer in the apartment.
name: Chelsea Studio
review: When I initially booked this apartment I did so simply bc of the location.  To me, it was a nice place to rest our heads for the evening but upon walking into his apartment, the word "nice" was definitely an understatement.  Dan's apartment was an absolute DREAM.  Everything was spotless, the bed was comfortable, the shower...I could have lived in that shower, and the location couldn't be beat.  Dan was super responsive, friendly, and you could tell he takes a lot of pride in his apartment.  Cannot wait to plan another trip up there in the near future!
